card_text: 2 Level 5 monsters$NWhen this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can attach that monster to this card as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Infinitrack River Stormer" once per turn.$N●You can detach 1 material from this card; take 1 EARTH Machine monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or send it to the GY.$N●If this card is in your GY: You can Tribute 1 Machine Link Monster; Special Summon this card in Defense Position.
